sql-case.value: CREATE USER 'user_dev_new'@'localhost'
CREATE USER user_dev_new
CREATE USER 'user_dev_new'@'localhost' identified by 'passwd_dev'
CREATE USER user_dev_new identified by passwd_dev
CREATE USER user_dev_new FOR LOGIN login_dev
CREATE USER user_dev_new PASSWORD 'passwd_dev'
CREATE LOGIN login_dev_new WITH PASSWORD = 'passwd_dev'
CREATE ROLE role_dev_new
CREATE ROLE role_dev_new identified by dev_passwd
CREATE ROLE role_dev_new PASSWORD 'passwd_dev'
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1, user2 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER 'user1'@'localhost' DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1, role2
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY 'password' DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 ACCOUNT LOCK
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT ACCOUNT LOCK
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED EXTERNALLY
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED GLOBALLY
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password DEFAULT TABLESPACE tablespace1
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password CONTAINER = ALL
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password QUOTA 1M ON tablespace1
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password PASSWORD EXPIRE ACCOUNT LOCK
